                                    # SpringBooté›†æˆSwagger

                                    åˆ›å»ºæ–°çš„SpringBooté¡¹ç›®springboot-swagger-firstï¼Œé›†æˆSwaggerï¼Œæ­¥éª¤å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                    1. pomæ–‡ä»¶æ·»åŠ Swaggerä¾èµ–ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½¿ç”¨åˆ°Springfox-swagger2ã€springfox-swagger-uiä¸¤ä¸ªjaråŒ…

                                    2. ç¼–å†™ä¸€ä¸ªç®€å•çš„controller

    }
}

                                    2. é€šè¿‡apiInfo()æ–¹æ³•é…ç½®æ–‡æ¡£ä¿¡æ¯

public ApiInfo apiInfo() {
    // contact è”ç³»äººä¿¡æ¯
    Contact contact = new Contact("è”ç³»äººåå­—", "http://xxx.xxx.com/è”ç³»äººè®¿é—®é“¾æ¥", "è”ç³»äººé‚®ç®±");

        "Swaggerå­¦ä¹ ", // æ ‡é¢˜

        "v1.0", // ç‰ˆæœ¬

                                    3. ä¿®æ”¹docket()æ–¹æ³•ï¼ŒDocket å®ä¾‹å…³è”apiInfo()

                                    æœ€ç»ˆæµ‹è¯•ç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                    éƒ¨åˆ†æºç è§£æï¼š

                                    public Docket(DocumentationType documentationType) {
  this.documentationType = documentationType;
}

                                    public class DocumentationType extends SimplePluginMetadata {
  public static final DocumentationType SWAGGER_12 = new DocumentationType("swagger", "1.2");
  public static final DocumentationType SWAGGER_2 = new DocumentationType("swagger", "2.0");
  public static final DocumentationType OAS_30 = new DocumentationType("openApi", "3.0");
  // ...
}

                                    public ApiInfo(String title, String description, String version, String termsOfServiceUrl, Contact contact, String license, String licenseUrl, Collection<VendorExtension> vendorExtensions) {
    this.title = title;
    this.description = description;
    this.version = version;
    this.termsOfServiceUrl = termsOfServiceUrl;
    this.contact = contact;
    this.license = license;
    this.licenseUrl = licenseUrl;
    this.vendorExtensions = new ArrayList(vendorExtensions);
}

                                    public Contact(String name, String url, String email) {
    this.name = name;
    this.url = url;
    this.email = email;
}

                                    # é…ç½®æ‰«ææ¥å£

                                    Swaggerå¯ä»¥æŒ‡å®šé…ç½®éœ€è¦æ‰«æçš„æ¥å£ï¼Œæ­¥éª¤å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                    1. ä½¿ç”¨select()æ–¹æ³•é…ç½®éœ€è¦æ‰«æçš„æ¥å£

                                      @Bean
public Docket docket() {
    return new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2).
        apiInfo(apiInfo()).
        select().
		// é€šè¿‡ .select() æ–¹æ³•å»é…ç½®æ‰«ææ¥å£, RequestHandlerSelectors é…ç½®å¦‚ä½•æ‰«ææ¥å£
        apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.basePackage("com.swagger.first.controller")).
        build();
}

                                    2. æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œå‘ç°Swaggerä»…ä»…æ‰«æäº†åŒ…è·¯å¾„com.swagger.first.controllerä¸‹çš„å†…å®¹

                                    3. é™¤äº†é€šè¿‡åŒ…è·¯å¾„é…ç½®æ‰«ææ¥å£å¤–ï¼Œè¿˜å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é…ç½®å…¶ä»–æ–¹å¼æ‰«ææ¥å£ï¼Œé…ç½®æ–¹å¼å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                      @Bean
public Docket docket() {
    return new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2).
        apiInfo(apiInfo()).
        select().
        // é€šè¿‡ .select() æ–¹æ³•å»é…ç½®æ‰«ææ¥å£, RequestHandlerSelectors é…ç½®å¦‚ä½•æ‰«ææ¥å£
        apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.basePackage("com.swagger.first.controller")).
        // apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.any()). // æ‰«ææ‰€æœ‰, é¡¹ç›®ä¸­çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ¥å£éƒ½ä¼šè¢«æ‰«æåˆ°
        // apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.none()). // ä¸æ‰«ææ¥å£
        // é€šè¿‡ç±»ä¸Šçš„æ³¨è§£æ‰«æ, Controller.class : åªæ‰«ææœ‰ @Controller æ³¨è§£çš„ç±»
        // apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.withClassAnnotation(Controller.class)).
        // é€šè¿‡æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šçš„æ³¨è§£æ‰«æ, GetMapping.class : åªæ‰«æ get è¯·æ±‚, æ–¹æ³•ä¸Šæœ‰æ³¨è§£ @GetMapping()
        // apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.withMethodAnnotation(GetMapping.class)).
        build();
}

                                    4. å¯ä»¥é…ç½®æ¥å£æ‰«æè¿‡æ»¤ï¼š

                                      @Bean
public Docket docket() {
    return new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2).
        apiInfo(apiInfo()).
        select().
        // é…ç½®é€šè¿‡ path è¿‡æ»¤, å³è¿™é‡Œåªæ‰«æè¯·æ±‚ä»¥ /hello å¼€å¤´çš„æ¥å£
        paths(PathSelectors.ant("/hello/**")).
        build();
}

// path è¿‡æ»¤ : paths(PathSelectors.ant("/hello/**")), HelloController å¯ä»¥è¢«æ‰«æåˆ°
@Controller
public class HelloController {

    @RequestMapping("/hello")
    @ResponseBody
    public String hello() {
        return "Hello, Swagger";
    }
}

                                      å¦‚æœä¿®æ”¹ä¸ºï¼š

                                      paths(PathSelectors.ant("/wyj/**"))

                                      ç”±äºä»£ç ä¸­æ²¡æœ‰/wyjè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå› æ­¤æ‰«æä¸åˆ°ä»»ä½•æ¥å£ä¿¡æ¯ï¼š

                                      PathSelectorså¸¸ç”¨æ–¹æ³•æœ‰ï¼š

                                      any() // ä»»ä½•è¯·æ±‚éƒ½æ‰«æ
none() // ä»»ä½•è¯·æ±‚éƒ½ä¸æ‰«æ
regex(final String pathRegex) // é€šè¿‡æ­£åˆ™è¡¨è¾¾å¼æ§åˆ¶
ant(final String antPattern) // é€šè¿‡ant()æ§åˆ¶

                                    # é…ç½®Swaggerå¼€å…³

                                    å½“é¡¹ç›®åœ¨å¼€å‘ç¯å¢ƒdevå’Œæµ‹è¯•ç¯å¢ƒtestæ—¶ï¼Œéœ€è¦å¼€å¯swaggerï¼Œé¡¹ç›®å‘å¸ƒç¯å¢ƒproä¸éœ€è¦æ˜¾ç¤ºswaggerï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡é…ç½®swaggerå¼€å…³æ¥å®ç°ï¼Œæ­¥éª¤å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š

                                    1. é€šè¿‡enable()æ–¹æ³•é…ç½®æ˜¯å¦å¯ç”¨swaggerï¼Œå¦‚æœæ˜¯falseï¼Œswaggerå°†ä¸èƒ½åœ¨æµè§ˆå™¨ä¸­è®¿é—®

                                      @Bean
public Docket docket() {
    return new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2).
        apiInfo(apiInfo()).
        // é…ç½®æ˜¯å¦å¯ç”¨ swagger, å¦‚æœæ˜¯ false, æµè§ˆå™¨å°†æ— æ³•è®¿é—®
        enable(false).
        select().
        apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.basePackage("com.swagger.first.controller")).
        build();
}

                                    2. æµ‹è¯•

                                    3. è°ƒç”¨Docketæ–¹æ³•docket(Environment environment) æ–¹æ³•

                                      @Bean
public Docket docket(Environment environment) {

    // è®¾ç½®é¡¹ç›®å¤„äºå“ªäº›ç¯å¢ƒæ—¶, éœ€è¦å¼€å¯ swagger
    // Profiles.of("dev", "test") å¤„äº dev test ç¯å¢ƒ å¼€å¯ swagger
    Profiles of = Profiles.of("dev", "test");
    // åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰é¡¹ç›®æ‰€å¤„ç¯å¢ƒ, å¦‚æœä¸º dev test ç¯å¢ƒ, è¿”å› true
    // é€šè¿‡ enable() æ¥æ”¶æ­¤å‚æ•°åˆ¤æ–­å¹¶å†³å®šæ˜¯å¦æ˜¾ç¤º
    boolean b = environment.acceptsProfiles(of);

    return new Docket(DocumentationType.SWAGGER_2).
            apiInfo(apiInfo()).
            enable(b).
            select().
            apis(RequestHandlerSelectors.basePackage("com.swagger.first.controller")).
            build();
}

  port: 8081

  port: 8080

  profiles:
    active: dev

                                      è®¿é—®http://localhost:8081/swagger-ui/index.htmlï¼Œå‘ç°å¼€å¯äº†`swagger`ï¼Œç»“æœå¦‚ä¸‹ï¼šopen in new window

                                    1. ç¼–å†™Userå®ä½“ç±»å’Œæ¥å£HelloControllerç›¸å…³æ–¹æ³•ï¼ˆè¿™é‡Œçš„æ¥å£è¡¨ç¤ºä¸€ä¸ªcontrollerç±»ï¼‰

                                      @Controller
public class HelloController {

    @GetMapping("/hello")
    @ResponseBody
    public String hello() {
        return "Hello, Swagger";
    }

    // åªè¦æ¥å£ä¸­è¿”å›å€¼ä¸­å­˜åœ¨å®ä½“ç±», å°±ä¼šè¢«æ‰«æåˆ° Swagger ä¸­
    @PostMapping("/user")
    public User user() {
        return new User();
    }

    @ApiOperation("Hello2æ§åˆ¶æ¥å£")
    @GetMapping("/hello2")
    public String hello2(@ApiParam("ç”¨æˆ·å") String username) {
        return "hello" + username;
    }

}

                                      @Api
@ApiModel("ç”¨æˆ·å®ä½“ç±»-User")
public class User {
    @ApiModelProperty("ç”¨æˆ·å")
    private String username;
    @ApiModelProperty("å¯†ç ")
    private String password;

    @ApiModelProperty("è·å–ç”¨æˆ·å")
    public String getUsername() {
        return username;
    }

    public void setUsername( @ApiParam("æ–¹æ³•å‚æ•°-ç”¨æˆ·å") String username) {
        this.username = username;
    }

    public String getPassword() {
        return password;
    }

    public void setPassword(String password) {
        this.password = password;
    }
}
